DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety FXR-450 healthy subject . This study also evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) FXR-450 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety FXR-450 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men woman nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) age 18 50 year inclusive screening . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Must able abstain smoking inpatient stay . Any significant medical disease . History cholecystectomy ( removal gallbladder ) . Any clinically important find physical examination , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , clinical laboratory test result .
